name: Wolf
description: Sharp sense of smell and hearing: The wolf has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks based on smell or hearing.Group tactics: The wolf has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of its allies is within 5 feet of the creature and is not incapacitated.
action: Bite: Melee Weapon Attack : +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit  : 7 (2d4 + 2) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 11 Strength saving throw or fall prone

name: Water Weird
description: Invisible in Water: The water weird is invisible while fully immersed in water.Water Bound: The water weird dies if it leaves the water to which it is bound or if that water is destroyed.
action: Constrict: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. Hit: 13 (3d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is grappled (escape DC 13) and pulled 5 feet toward the water weird. Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, the water weird tries to drown it, and the water weird can't constrict another target.
